sourcesContent:
<form>
    <input name="fn" type="text" placeholder="enter your name" [(ngModel)]="task.firstName">
    <input  name="ln" type="text" placeholder="enter your lastname" [(ngModel)]="task.lastName">

    <select name="j" id="" [(ngModel)]="task.j">
        <option value="როკი">როკი</option>
        <option value="კლასიკური">კლასიკური</option>
    </select>

    <button (click)="submit()">submit</button>
</form>
{{array[0].toString()}}
